item.title: Ullrich angry
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: Jan Ullrich is upset about Lance's comments about him being lazy: "Lance does not know me at all. This comment is probably due to his American mentality." Ullrich wasn't much of a threat in the 2004 Tour but, assuming Lance does race it in 2005, this could be the start of a good rivalry. They've had a good rapport before, however.
